title: 阪神JFの後に・不屈たる様

text.jpText:
『阪神JF』での勝利を逃したエアグルーヴ。
彼女はこの敗北を必ず次に活かすと誓い、
次のレースに向けて意欲を高めた。
text.enText:
Airgroove failed to win the Hanshin JF. She 
vowed to make the most of this defeat and and 
is eagerly awaiting the next race.

text.jpText:
レースから数日。次にどんなレースへ
出るのか連日のように話題になるほど、
彼女は世間から注目される存在になっていた。
text.enText:
A few days have passed since the race. She 
was in the public spotlight so much that 
people were talking about what race she was 
going to enter next day after day. She had 
become a focus of public attention.

text.jpText:
そんな中、エアグルーヴは多くの
ウマ娘たちが“かくありたい”と
憧れるような存在になるため――
text.enText:
In the midst of all this, Airgroove is 
working to become the kind of person that 
many horsewomen aspire to be. to be the kind 
of person that many horsemaidens aspire to be.

text.jpText:
『桜花賞』『オークス』『秋華賞』の
3つのレースを駆け抜けるティアラ路線を
目指すと、迷いなく言い切るのだった。
text.enText:
She had no hesitation in saying that she 
would aim for a tiara route that would take 
her through the three races of 
"Sakurabana-sho," "Oaks," and "Shukka-sho. 
She said without hesitation that she would 
aim to run the three races, "Oka Sho," 
"Oaks," and "Shuka Sho.

coloredText.enText:
Japan's National Football Championship (held 
annually by the Japan Football Association)

Fall Flowers Festival (national holiday held 
from 1868 to 1948)
